name: Chainlink Price Oracle
description: AI agent that provides real-time cryptocurrency price data using Chainlink decentralized price feeds on Ethereum mainnet. Supports price lookups via ENS resolution for accurate, on-chain verified market data.

skills.name: Cryptocurrency Price Lookup
skills.description: Look up real-time cryptocurrency prices in USD using Chainlink price feeds. Returns price data with round ID, timestamps, and contract address.
examples: What is the current price of ETH?
Look up the price of BTC
